attributes.action: Revoke Brunei fromThe commonwealth. Due to its anti lgbt views and new laws
attributes.additional_details: The Brunei state needs sanctions from. British business and our government needs to immediately revoke Brunei from the commonwealth to send a message that the British people will not tolerate murdering or making criminals of people who are of the lgbt community
attributes.background: As a gay man the sultan of Brunei is nothing but an evil dictator and the UK government needs to act against countries and people like this. The stoning to death of anyone is cruel barbaric and needs to be stop3
